arts.ttl: How Wrexham and Birmingham became global names
arts.sum: BBC Sport Wales looks at the story of how Wrexham and Birmingham City became names on the lips of football fans around the world.

There is a full slate of Championship matches taking place across Friday, Saturday and Sunday and Dan Childs has provided correct-score predictions for all 12 games.

arts.ttl: Wrexham vs Birmingham predictions: Red Dragons can come out best in battle of big-spenders
arts.sum: Wrexham and Birmingham were promoted to the Championship together last season but Jamie Griffith feels it will the Red Dragons that come out on top at the Racecourse Ground on Friday night.

arts.ttl: Davies on Birmingham's trip to Wrexham: 'I detach myself from the hype'
arts.sum: It has been a solid, if unspectacular, return to the Championship for Birmingham City.
